about_the_game:
"Fall" was created by Tan Haoxiang, the individual game developer of "The Jiang Si", "The Jiang Si 2: Curse of Soul", and "Star Quest","Fall" is a top-down modern zombie-style meat pigeon action game that presents players with a challenging and surprising post-apocalyptic this game, you will play as a survivor, shuttling through the ruins of a city overrun by zombies, exploring unknown areas, collecting resources, strengthening yourself, and fighting life and death with various forms of zombies.

Rich weapons and equipment

From automatic rifles to grenade launchers, from simple police drones to high-tech artificial intelligence characters, the game provides a diverse selection of weapons.

Thrilling combat system

Facing hordes of zombies, players need to use strategies and skills to take advantage of the environment and force them to make wise choices between attack and survival.

Diverse types of zombies

From ordinary zombies to mutants with special abilities, players will face different challenges.Some zombies are extremely fast, while others have strong attack power, forcing players to constantly adjust their tactics.

Story-driven background

Although the game is mainly in the Rogue-like mode, there is a fascinating story hidden behind it.As the game progresses, players will gradually uncover the reasons behind the end of the world and the possible path to redemption.

"Fall" is not only a game that tests players' operational skills, but also a profound exploration of human nature, survival, and each game, players will experience different stories and face different challenges, and every failure is for a stronger rebirth.

Official communication group QQ of "Fall": 752209909

name: FALL

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows10/11
  • Processor: Intel i5 4代
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows10/11
  • Processor: Intel i5 4代以上配置
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: In the past, the world was almost invaded by zombies.You will play the commander of the remaining survivor camp, searching for hope for the last surviving companions, forming and assigning your special police squad to explore this post-apocalyptic world filled with zombies!
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English*, Traditional Chinese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean
*languages with full audio support
